survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer attitudes and barriers toward electric vehicle (EV) adoption to inform marketing and policy strategies.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) as your next car?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure options are balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) as your next car?

questions.question_text: What is the primary factor that would encourage you to buy an EV?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option if needed for open-ended responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with optional 'Other' text field.

script.question_text: What is the primary factor that would encourage you to buy an EV?

questions.question_text: Which of the following concerns do you have about EVs? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following concerns do you have about EVs? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with government incentives for EV purchases?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point scale to measure awareness levels.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with government incentives for EV purchases?

questions.question_text: What is your household income range?
questions.client_notes: Include standard income brackets with a 'Prefer not to say' option.

script.question_text: What is your household income range?

questions.question_text: How many vehicles does your household currently own?
questions.client_notes: Use simple numeric options for clarity.

script.question_text: How many vehicles does your household currently own?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for an EV with extended range (e.g., 400+ miles per charge)?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Somewhat likely' or 'Very likely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no/unsure format for quick feedback.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for an EV with extended range (e.g., 400+ miles per charge)?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Somewhat likely' or 'Very likely' in Q1

questions.question_text: How important is access to fast-charging stations in your decision to purchase an EV?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Somewhat likely' or 'Very likely' in Q1

script.question_text: How important is access to fast-charging stations in your decision to purchase an EV?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Somewhat likely' or 'Very likely' in Q1

questions.question_text: Which EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select with a cap of 3 choices to prioritize top-of-mind awareness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with max selections enforced.

script.question_text: Which EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What additional features would make an EV more appealing to you? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Use this to capture qualitative insights beyond predefined options.

script.question_text: What additional features would make an EV more appealing to you? (Open-ended)
